data.text:
@SenHydeSmith @POTUS Would you please explain WHY IN TARNATION AREN’T YOU ON THIS LIST?
Mississippians want this and you are our representative. https://t.co/a7yQnpjlWg

@SenHydeSmith @POTUS The biggest disaster will be if the SAVE Act is not passed. 

When are you showing your support?
@SenHydeSmith @POTUS Please support & pass the SAVE Act.

@SenHydeSmith @POTUS Some say Iran is“not our problem”
This is Islamic Republic:threatening U.S&world security,advancing its nuclear program,exploiting negotiations,funding Hamas,using civilians as shields.
Delay in action strengthens them
Support a democratic transition under @PahlaviReza leadership

@SenHydeSmith @POTUS Have you announced your support for The SAVE America Act? 
Utilize the Standing Filibuster to pass it!
@SenHydeSmith @MSPolitics1817 @POTUS I thibk it’s time for change.  @SaveJxn

@SenHydeSmith @POTUS After decades of Islamic Republic massacres, Iranians are united behind Reza Pahlavi for a democratic future.
#KingRezaPahlavi #RezaPahlaviForIran #FreeIran #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026
@SenHydeSmith @POTUS This is awesome, but do more for our great state! Make sure your signature is on the SAVE ACT and keep our state and country safe!
@SenHydeSmith @POTUS Let’s not worry about the tornados from last year because that doesn’t fit your narrative. Vote for a change Mississippi March 10th 👇 https://t.co/JW1kQTXSEa
